snippet: The federal government has sold more than 400,000 acres in the Gulf of Mexico off the Texas coast for oil and gas exploration and development.
lead_paragraph: The federal government has sold more than 400,000 acres in the Gulf of Mexico off the Texas coast for oil and gas exploration and development.

headline.main: U.S. Government Sells 400,000 Acres in Gulf
headline.print_headline: U.S. Government Sells 400,000 Acres In Gulf
